boolean.name: manageDirectDebitPayment
boolean.title: Manage direct debit payment
boolean.help: This configuration enables direct debit payment management directly from the application.

boolean.name: manageCreditTransferPayment
boolean.title: Manage credit transfer payment
boolean.help: This configuration enables credit transfer payment management directly from the application.

boolean.name: manageBankToBankTransferPayment
boolean.title: Manage bank to bank transfer payment
boolean.help: This configuration enables bank-to-bank transfer payment management directly from the application.

boolean.name: manageBillOfExchange
boolean.title: Manage bill of exchange
boolean.help: This configuration enables bill of exchange management, meaning you can manage bank orders of LCR type (lettre de change releve).

boolean.name: useEditorInBankOrderForm
boolean.title: Use editor in bank order form
boolean.help: If checked, the bank order form view will use an editor widget, which simplifies data entry but may cause performance issues when the bank order has too many lines.

boolean.name: enableBankOrderFileEncryption
boolean.help: This allows encrypting bank order files according to the properties file settings. Enabling this option will not encrypt old files.
